title: Design of Brasilia, Canberra, Washington, DC

content.prompt: What aspect of the design of Bras√≠lia, Canberra, and Washington, D.C., was different from the design of most other urban centers?

choices.label: They were designed as show places to reflect the power and wealth of their respective countries
